relationships.history: Saw potential where others saw nothing.
Only one of them can have what they both want.

Some say the affair still smolders.

landmarks.name: The Floating Altar
landmarks.description: A floating altar, vibrating when approached.

landmarks.name: The Petrified Cairn
landmarks.description: A petrified cairn, bearing the marks of a thousand years.

landmarks.name: The Crystalline Cairn
landmarks.description: A crystalline cairn, home to a silent, white-haired hermit.

landmarks.name: The Ancient Spring
landmarks.description: A ancient spring, bearing the marks of a thousand years.

landmarks.name: The Blood-stained Cave
landmarks.description: A blood-stained cave, bearing the marks of a thousand years.

landmarks.name: The Weather-worn Cave
landmarks.description: A weather-worn cave, bearing the marks of a thousand years.

ruins.name: Sunken Forge
ruins.description: An ancient sunken forge from the Empire of Dust.
ruins.history: Sunken Forge was once a center of faith before its fall.

ruins.name: Silver Forge
ruins.description: An ancient silver forge from the Age of Wonders.
ruins.history: Silver Forge was once a center of war before its fall.

storyThreads.title: The Amestris Compact
storyThreads.summary: Amestris made a deal with powers best left alone.

beats.summary: The Hawk Compact declares a shortage of fish
A new tale begins: "The Amestris Compact"
Consequences follow. Amestris remains driven by curiosity and discovery.

potentialOutcomes: The pact is fulfilled as agreed.
A loophole is found. The pact is broken.
The pact-maker pays the full price.
The terms are renegotiated at great cost.
The other party to the pact is destroyed.

storyThreads.title: What Was Promised
storyThreads.summary: Gille made a deal with powers best left alone.

beats.summary: The Hawk Compact declares a shortage of textiles
Benefits emerge. Gille remains motivated by fear and survival.
Redemption occurs.

potentialOutcomes: The pact is fulfilled as agreed.
A loophole is found. The pact is broken.
The pact-maker pays the full price.
The terms are renegotiated at great cost.
The other party to the pact is destroyed.

storyThreads.title: A People in Motion
storyThreads.summary: Everything is changing. The old order crumbles.

beats.summary: gnoll begin migration
Integration begins.

potentialOutcomes: The migrants find a new home.
The migrants are turned back or destroyed.
The migration destabilizes multiple regions.
The migrants conquer rather than settle.
Integration proves possible, if difficult.

storyThreads.title: Blood on the Trail
storyThreads.summary: Sidonia stalks a dangerous quarry across the region.

beats.summary: Trade routes near Belfos grow dangerous
Local villagers share rumors of the prey.

potentialOutcomes: The quarry is slain.
The quarry escapes to parts unknown.
The hunters become the hunted.
An unexpected alliance forms.
The quarry is captured alivebut for what purpose?

storyThreads.title: Echoes of the Past
storyThreads.summary: Orable confronts spirits who refuse to pass on.

beats.summary: Windleigh spirits high
The haunting ends.

potentialOutcomes: The spirits are laid to rest.
The haunting intensifies to lethal levels.
Coexistence is negotiated.
The ghosts reveal crucial information.
The "haunting" proves to have mortal origins.

storyThreads.title: The Hunt for Parthenius's Band
storyThreads.summary: A deadly game of cat and mouse unfolds near Greenmist.

beats.summary: Parthenius's Band spot signs of danger
The quarry turns the tables, becoming the Parthenius's Band. Parthenius's Band remains seeks knowledge and wisdom.
A storm hampers the pursuit.
The chase crosses into forbidden territory.

potentialOutcomes: The quarry is slain.
The quarry escapes to parts unknown.
The hunters become the hunted.
An unexpected alliance forms.
The quarry is captured alivebut for what purpose?

storyThreads.title: Crown and Contenders
storyThreads.summary: Legitimacy, force, and cunning all have their advocates.

beats.summary: Katixa makes their move
The claimants campaign actively.
Compromises are proposed. Katixa remains motivated by fear and survival.

potentialOutcomes: The rightful heir prevails.
The strongest claimant seizes power.
Civil war erupts over the succession.
An outside power dictates the succession.
An unexpected candidate emerges victorious.

storyThreads.title: What Lingers
storyThreads.summary: The dead do not rest peacefully in Minasfeld.

beats.summary: Minasfeld spirits high

potentialOutcomes: The spirits are laid to rest.
The haunting intensifies to lethal levels.
Coexistence is negotiated.
The ghosts reveal crucial information.
The "haunting" proves to have mortal origins.
